price: Kwa anaye taka miongoni mwenu kutangulia au kuchelewa.
arabic: لِمَن شَآءَ مِنكُمۡ أَن يَتَقَدَّمَ أَوۡ يَتَأَخَّرَ

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: liman shāa minkum an yataqaddama aw yata-akhara
